nivor 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Calendar Visualization

calendar.Rd

Calendar Visualization

calendar(
  data = NULL,
  day = NULL,
  value = NULL,
  from = NULL,
  to = NULL,
  ...,
  width = NULL,
  height = NULL,
  elementId = NULL
)

Arguments

data

a data.frame contains day and value for create the calendar.
day, value

column names of day and value. if not provided, it will use the first column as day, and the second column as value.
from

start date
to

end date
...

additional arguments
width, height

Must be a valid CSS unit (like '100%', '400px', 'auto') or a number, which will be coerced to a string and have 'px' appended.
elementId

element id of widgets

Value

a nivo calendar component

See also

Additional arguments

Examples

library(nivor)

df <- data.frame(
  day = seq.Date(
    from = as.Date("2020-04-01"),
    length.out = 600,
    by = "days"
  ),
  value = round(runif(600) * 1000, 0)
)

# default
calendar(df)

# GitHub style
calendar(
  data = df,
  emptyColor = "#eeeeee",
  colors = c("#d6e685", "#8cc665", "#44a340", "#1e6823"),
  yearSpacing = 40,
  monthBorderColor = "#ffffff",
  dayBorderWidth = 2,
  dayBorderColor = "#ffffff"
)
